showScoreExcerpt:
Some Like It Hot was a victory for people wanting to be who they are every day. It was moving to see Daphne embrace the fluidity of gender and lean into who she is today not being who she is forever. People rarely stay exactly the same our whole life long in any facet of our identity--we grapple with what our identities means in diverse contexts. Daphne is human: unsure at times, worried about implications, and steeped in self-sabotage-- to me, that is the epitome of my transgender experience.

Read more

keyPhrases.quote: Some Like It Hot was a victory for people wanting to be who they are every day.
